## Chess.clear() method

Clears the board.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clear(keep_headers?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keep\_headers | boolean | Flag to keep headers |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```js
chess.clear()
chess.fen()
// -> '8/8/8/8/8/8/8/8 w - - 0 1' <- empty board

```
